message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only pay $8500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. I'm willing to go down to $8750 for the product. This would be a fair deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $8600 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Bob, I see we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8650. This price still leaves some room for profit for me, while giving you a good deal on the product.  Let's close this deal!
